item.title: Laravel Mailing
item.description: Single Email With Multiple Recipients 1$emailRecipient = ['email01@example.com', 'email02@example.com']; 2Mail::to($emailRecipient)->send(new MailOnServiceFailure($logTimestamp, $failedContent)); 3Log::info("Service Failure Mail Alert sent successfully to " . json_encode($emailRecipient)); Single Email Per Recipients 1$emailRecipient = ['email01@example.com', 'email02@example.com']; 2foreach ($emailRecipient as $eachEmail) { 3Mail::to($eachEmail)->send(new MailOnServiceFailure($logTimestamp, $failedContent); 4Log::info("Service Failure Mail Alert sent successfully to {$eachEmail}."); 5}
